sourcing.instructions: B: Chemical supply companies, Nb: Metal suppliers, Ru: Precious metal dealers, Ti: Metal suppliers
steps: B: Chemical supply companies, Nb: Metal suppliers, Ru: Precious metal dealers, Ti: Metal suppliers

1. Weigh out each material using a precision scale. 2. In a clean ceramic or glass container, mix B, Nb, Ru, and Ti thoroughly using a spatula for 10 minutes. 3. Ensure uniform distribution of all ingredients.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Weigh out each material using a precision scale. 2. In a clean ceramic or glass container, mix B, Nb, Ru, and Ti thoroughly using a spatula for 10 minutes. 3. Ensure uniform distribution of all ingredients.

steps: 1. Preheat a furnace to 1200°C. 2. Place the mixed powders in a graphite crucible. 3. Heat for 2 hours to ensure complete melting and reaction of components.
heating.raw_text: 1. Preheat a furnace to 1200°C. 2. Place the mixed powders in a graphite crucible. 3. Heat for 2 hours to ensure complete melting and reaction of components.

steps: 1. Turn off the furnace and allow it to cool naturally to room temperature (approximately 3-4 hours). 2. Avoid rapid cooling to prevent cracking.
cooling.raw_text: 1. Turn off the furnace and allow it to cool naturally to room temperature (approximately 3-4 hours). 2. Avoid rapid cooling to prevent cracking.

steps: 1. Remove the solid sample from the crucible. 2. Use a diamond sanding tool to smooth out any rough edges. 3. Optionally, apply a thin layer of protective coating to enhance durability.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Remove the solid sample from the crucible. 2. Use a diamond sanding tool to smooth out any rough edges. 3. Optionally, apply a thin layer of protective coating to enhance durability.
